ygData.subject: Dragoon Dirk, Shiny Brass Shield and Crush's tunic
ygData.msgSnippet: These 3 itmes seem to be bardic items to me! The dirk (light and fast) Crushes tunic (AC12, +8 magic fire and cold resist and only 4 pounds or so) and the SBS,
ygData.messageBody:
These 3 itmes seem to be bardic items to me! The dirk (light and fast)
Crushes tunic (AC12, +8 magic fire and cold resist and only 4 pounds or
so) and the SBS, great shield before you have dual wield! (ac10, +10
magic resist and light).

Just wanted to mention that the Tunic and Shield are now officially LORE
items, meaning you may only possess one (including if you have one in
bank!). I believe the Dirk has been one for a while.

Anyway, what i was getting to, in CrushBone today, there was someone
soloing crush and dvinn and LEAVING the itmes on the corpses! then he
would shout "Come get Dvinn's dagger for free" "Come get crush's tunic
for free". This was happenning on the innoruk server. so, if you are in
need of these items, take a stroll over to CB, maybe you will get lucky.

(I had already bought both the tunic and dirk, at retail value :( )


--
Jason Rochelle
Replace "nospam" with "HOME" to reply
